Summary: A very bright light dashed diagonally and seemed to disappear and reappear.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving from work and noticed aircraft taking off from LAX and veering left over the pacific. At that time I noticed a very bright object that was seemed to fly, stop and disappear. It was brighter than the aircraft in the distance. I watched it for about five minutes and then it disappeared once more and didn't reappear. From So La Cienega Blvd and looking west, I spotted a very bright object that seemed to dart diagonally, disappear and reappear and dart again. It reminded me of a bat catching insects.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in El Segundo
There were no other sightings in El Segundo on or around March 2nd 2009
